description: This file contains CSS styles for the App component in a Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styles for the App component of the Tic Tac Toe game.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the App component.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the App component.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles between light and dark themes.
